properties.name: Chengcheng
properties.description: Posted by WunanhereShaanxi10/28/07 9 miners have been trapped in a coal mine flooding accident for more than 30 hours in China

properties.name: Chongqing Municipality
properties.description: Posted by WunanhereChongqing 10/26/07 AT least seven people were killed during a mine blast in southwest China\'s Chongqing Municipality yesterday.

properties.name: Huquangou mine in Zuoyun
properties.description: Posted by WunanhereShanxi09/22/07 Rescuers were struggling on Sunday to extinguish a three-day-old fire in a northern China coal mine that has killed three miners and left another 15 missing, state media reported.

properties.name: Jianxin in Huibu
properties.description: Posted by WunanhereJiangxi10/15/07: The bodies of 16 workers buried alive after an explosion in an east China mine have been found, state media reported on Monday.

properties.name: Shunxing Mine in Fuyuan
properties.description: Posted by WunanhereYunnan China10/06/07 At least seven Chinese coal miners were killed and another five injured Saturday when a gas explosion ripped through the underground shaft where they toiled.

properties.name: Xiaojie Qiao
properties.description: Posted by WunanhereBeijing This is where I used to live. My neighbors made this cute snowman in winter.

properties.name: Xinwen
properties.description: Posted by WunanhereShandong10/01/07 Officials have abandoned efforts to retrieve the bodies of 172 coal miners from a flooded mine in eastern China.

properties.name: Yanbian
properties.description: Posted by WunanhereJilin10/21/07 Four miners killed in coal mine accident.

properties.name: Yingying
properties.description: Posted by WunanhereShanxi10/24/07 Twelve people were killed when a mine tunnel collapsed during works for its enlargement in a Yinying mine in the Shanxi province.

properties.name: Yongding
properties.description: Posted by WunanhereFujian10/09/07, one worker was killed and four others remained missing in a flooded colliery in east China\'s Fujian Province.

properties.name: Zhijian mine in Sanmenxia
properties.description: Posted by WunanhereHenan07/09/07 Sixty-nine miners have been trapped in a flooded central Chinese coal mine operating above its design capacity, state media reported on Monday.
